thread.title: MARC JACOBS The Beauty True Red Leather Bag
thread.title_full: MARC JACOBS The Beauty True Red Leather Bag

title: MARC JACOBS The Beauty True Red Leather Bag
text:
Add ‘The Beauty’ bag from Marc Jacobs to your small accessories collection. This New Season travel slash cosmetic bag is crafted from premium pebbled leather with polished gold tone accents. The secure top zip fastening reveals a roomy singular compartment featuring an internal jacquard patch. Carry by the detachable wristlet strap on keep in your bag for maximum organization. Classic debossed logo adds detail. Signature Marc Jacobs branding is seen throughout.
UK Priority Delivery: Delivered within 48 hours Monday -Thursday using courier DHL or Royal Mail, Our Priority Delivery charge is £7.49
UK Next Day Delivery: Delivered Next working day when ordered before 1pm Monday - Thursday using courier DHL or Royal Mail, Our Next Day Delivery charge is £7.49
UK Saturday: Available until 1pm Friday, orders placed after 1pm Friday will be delivered the following Saturday. (Sent via DHL). Our Saturday delivery charge is £9.99. Standard: Delivery takes 2-4 working Days. (Sent via DHL or Royail Mail). Our standard delivery charge is £5.79 or Free for orders over £120
Republic Of Ireland
Orders take 2-4 working days from despatch date. Our delivery charge is £9.99, orders are sent by Royal Mail or DHL for Republic of Ireland.
All parcels are despatched on a signed for service, we recommend you do not change this. If you wish to do so Daniel Footwear do not take responsibility for lost items. If you are not available the couriers will attempt a neighbour.
We Offer a subsidised returns service for all UK orders, you can generate your returns label on the below link
https://www.royalmail.com/track-my-return#/details/6532
Our extended returns period launches on the 6th November, orders placed on or after this date have until the 5th January or 28 days to return their item (whichever date is later)
View our full Delivery & Returns information
